title: Un Amour a Paris = a Romance in Paris
description: This is an 'amour fou' story about two strangers who meet and fall in love in Paris. Marie, is a young Jewish girl from Algeria who comes to Paris with the hope of becoming a model. She is sidetracked when she meets Ali, a French-born Algerian, who has just been released from a 3 year stint in jail.  Ali makes plans to meet up with an accomplice to get his share of the money from a robbery in order to travel to Houston,Texas, and become a 'cosmonaut'. Further reading: 'Questions of identity in Beur cinema: from 'Tea in the harem' to 'Cheb''. Screen, 34: 4 (Winter 1993): pp 321-342.  Credits: Director, Merzak Allouache ; writer, Merzak Allouache ; photography, Jean-Claude Larrieu ; music, Jean-Marie Senia. Cast: Karim Allaoui, Catherine Wilkening, Juliet Berto, Muriel Combeau, Dany Cohn-Bendit.
